          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Diazotisation of phenylamine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diazotierung von phenylamine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diazotisation de phenylamine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diazotisation do phenylamine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diazotazione del phenylamine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Diazotisation του phenylamine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diazotisation del phenylamine</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the equation for the diazotisation reaction of phenylamine with nitrous acid and hydrochloric acid forming the diazonium salt.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">diazonium salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">diazotisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitrous acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phenylamine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phenyldiazonium chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction mixture</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Gleichung für die 
Diazotierungreaktion von phenylamine mit salpetriger Säure und der 
Salzsäure, die das Diazoniumsalz bildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'équation pour la 
réaction de diazotisation du phenylamine avec de l'acide nitreux et 
l'acide chlorhydrique formant le sel de diazonium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a equação para a 
reação do diazotisation do phenylamine com ácido nitrous e o ácido
hydrochloric que dão forma ao sal do diazonium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'equazione per la 
reazione di diazotazione del phenylamine con acido nitroso ed acido 
cloridrico che formano il sale del diazonio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την εξίσωση για τη 
diazotisation αντίδραση του phenylamine με το νιτρώδες οξύ 
και το υδροχλωρικό οξύ που διαμορφώνει το diazonium άλας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la ecuación para la 
reacción del diazotisation del phenylamine con el ácido nitroso y el
ácido hidroclórico que forman la sal del diazonium.</string>
          </description>
